Name: Tough
Description: You HP max increases by 1

Name: Toxic Fortitude
Description: You have Poison Resistance (Half) and ADV on Saves against being Poisoned

Name: Iron Stomach
Description: You have ADV on Saves against effects that come from consuming foods or liquids

Name: Thick-Skinned
Description: Your AC increases by 1 while you're not wearing Heavy Armor

Name: Thick-Bearded
Description: You are immune to airborne effects that would deal poison damage or impose the Poisoned condition

Name: Dense
Description: You have ADV on any Checks or Saves to avoid being forcibly moved

Name: Cave Diver
Description: You have Darkvision up to 4 Spaces

Name: Minor Tremorsense
Description: You have Tremorsense up 2 to Spaces

Name: Natural Hunter
Description: You have Expertise in Survival

Name: Grounded Nature
Description: You have ADV on Checks and Saves against being Charmed

Name: Natural Camouflage
Description: When obscured by foliage, you have ADV on Stealth Checks

Name: Wild Runner
Description: You are not affected by Difficult Terrain

Name: Traversal of Wilds
Description: You have a Climbing Speed equal to your Speed

Name: Prey Instinct
Description: You only need 4 hours of “No Activity” to complete a Long Rest and have ADV on Perception rolls to wake up form sleeping

Name: Green Thumb
Description: You can cast the Druidcraft cantrip

Name: Attribute Increase
Description: Choose an Attribute. The chosen Attribute increases by 1 (up your Attribute Limit)

Name: Human Resolve
Description: Your Death’s Door Threshold value is expanded by 1

Name: Flexibility
Description: You gain 1 additional Skill Point during Character Creation

Name: Quick Learner
Description: You gain 1 Skill Point

Name: Human Spirit
Description: You have ADV on Death Saves

Name: Natural Diplomat
Description: You learn an additional Common Language

Name: Mundane
Description: You have ADV on Saves and Checks to discern magical illusions

Name: Persistent
Description: The penalties from the Exhaustion condition are reduced by 1

Name: Small Form
Description: - You have ADV on saves against traps - When you use a weapon with the loading property, the AP is increased by 1 - Your Speed is reduced by 1 when wielding a Heavy Shield - A day's ration instead lasts 2 days for you and you require less water to survive

Name: Elusive
Description: When you take the Disengage Action, you instead gain the benefit of a the Full Disengage Action

Name: Fleet of Foot
Description: You have ADV on Initiative rolls. The second time you take the Move Action in a round of combat, your Speed is not halved

Name: Light Body
Description: You take 1 less falling damage

Name: Fight-or-Flight
Description: Once per day, you can end the Intimated or Frightened Condition on yourself for free at anytime

Name: Deft Form
Description: You gain Expertise with Sleight of Hand

Name: Natural Climber
Description: You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed

Name: Scurry
Description: When an Attack of Opportunity misses you, you can move 1 more space without provoking anymore Attacks of Opportunity

Name: Defying Endurance
Description: Once per day, the first time you would be reduced to Death's Door, you are instead reduced to 1 HP

Name: Nomad
Description: Choose Animal Handling or Survival, you gain Expertise with that skill

Name: Runner
Description: Increase your Speed by 1

Name: Brutal Strikes
Description: You deal +1 damage when you score a Brutal or Critical Hit with a Melee Weapon or Unarmed Strike

Name: Persistent Traveler
Description: You have ADV on saves against Exhaustion

Name: Born Rider
Description: You have ADV on Saves and Checks to stay on your mount
